channel.title: Auto Restarter?
channel.description: im using satans isle server and i need a auto restarter how can i get one? or where can i get one from can any one tell me plz.

item.title: Auto Restarter?
item.dc:creator: @zwala zwala
item.description:
@zwala wrote:

hey turk wat is the ip of your server??
ps: can i be mod ?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 06:39:50 AM[/size][hr][code]// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 4600;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 9999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}
[/code]

Read full topic
